document.title: SP489-C-Something Better Than Punishment

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Argicultural Extension Service

document.abstract:
When we think of discipline, we may think of threats and punishment. They may be the most common ways that parents deal with their childrenâ€™s misbehavior.

What is wrong with threats and punishment? One thing that is wrong with them is that they teach children bad things. Can you think of some bad things that are taught to children by the use of threats and punishment?
